item.title: Journal your life Using Emacs Org
item.description: .ox-hugo-toc ul { list-style: none; } Table of Contents 1 Introduction 2 Install 3 Keys 3.1 Global Bindings 3.2 Major Mode Bindings 3.3 Calendar Mode Bindings 4 Take a Journal 5 Browse Your Journal 6 Search Your Journal 7 After a Period 1 Introduction Long time ago, I read a post about taking daily journal using Emacs. Until recently, I realized that I need to take journals on my work.
